trans-unit.resname: P10·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Name
P10·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
P10·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: P10·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from spells that are one or more colors, annihilator 6
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反有色咒语保护，歼灭6

trans-unit.resname: P10·4★ | Emrakul, the Aeons Torn | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: 当万世创伤伊莫库从任何区域进入坟墓场时，其拥有者将其坟墓场洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: P10·76 | Comet Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1}（你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: P10·76 | Comet Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. CARDNAME deals X damage to each of them.
trans-unit.target: 选择任意一个目标，然后此咒语每增幅过一次，就选择另一个目标。彗星雨对它们各造成X点伤害。
